enhancedContent.overview:
Game Log Record is a comprehensive Notion template designed for passionate gamers who want to organize and celebrate their gaming journey. This bilingual template (English/Korean) transforms your game collection into a beautifully organized digital library with progress tracking, completion status, and visual memories from your gaming experiences.

The template goes beyond simple game lists to create a complete gaming archive. Track which games you're currently playing, catalog your backlog, maintain a wishlist for upcoming releases, and showcase your best gaming moments through an integrated screenshot gallery. The template even includes a customizable game cover decoration system using figmama templates.

With 178 sales and strong user ratings, this free template has become popular among gamers who treat gaming as a serious hobby worth documenting. It's perfect for collectors, completionists, and anyone who wants to look back on their gaming history with the same care music lovers give to album collections or readers give to book libraries.

complexityLevel.label: Easy
complexityLevel.details: User-friendly template with clear organization and included setup guide. Basic Notion familiarity is helpful, but the template structure is intuitive for anyone who understands game libraries and status tracking.

faqs.question: Does this template automatically import my game library from Steam or other platforms?
faqs.answer: No, this is a manual tracking template. You'll need to add your games individually to the database. However, this manual approach allows you to track games across all platforms (PC, console, mobile) in one unified library.

faqs.question: What is the figmama template for game covers?
faqs.answer: Figmama is a design tool that allows you to create custom, aesthetically pleasing game cover images for your Notion database. The template is designed to work with decorative covers you can create using figmama templates, making your game library visually appealing.

faqs.question: Can I track games I haven't finished or games I want to buy?
faqs.answer: Yes! The template includes status tracking for games in progress, completed games, backlog titles you own but haven't played, and a dedicated wishlist section for games you want to purchase in the future.

faqs.question: Is the template available in languages other than English and Korean?
faqs.answer: The template is designed with English and Korean language support. While you could translate the labels to other languages by editing the database properties, it's optimized for English and Korean speakers.
